original_text: And the time that Jeroboam reigned was twenty-two years. And he slept with his fathers, and Nadab his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 여로보암이 왕이 된 지 이십이 년이라 그가 그의 조상들과 함께 자매 그의 아들 나답이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And the time that Jeroboam reigned was twenty-two years.
And he slept with his fathers,
and Nadab his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 나답이 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니라
